meaningMnemonic: There's <radical>rice</radical> spread out all over the <radical>ground</radical>. This will cause the Predator to <kanji>come</kanji> because he loves kome (rice). Then once he's gone, the <kanji>next</kanji> Predator will come to eat.
readingMnemonic: When they come, though, everyone is disappointed. It turns out it's <reading>rye</reading> (らい) grains, and rye grains taste terrible. Yuck.
